verses.verse: To the chief Musician, <WH5329> Al-taschith, <WH516> A Psalm <WH4210> or Song <WH7892> of Asaph. <WH623> Unto thee, O God, <WH430> do we give thanks, <WH3034> unto thee do we give thanks: <WH3034> for that thy name <WH8034> is near <WH7138> thy wondrous works <WH6381> declare. <WH5608>
When <WH3588> I shall receive <WH3947> the congregation <WH4150> I <WH589> will judge <WH8199> uprightly. <WH4339>
The earth <WH776> and all <WH3605> the inhabitants <WH3427> thereof are dissolved: <WH4127> I <WH595> bear up <WH8505> the pillars <WH5982> of it. Selah. <WH5542>
I said <WH559> unto the fools, <WH1984> Deal not foolishly: <WH408> <WH1984> and to the wicked, <WH7563> Lift not up <WH7311> <WH408> the horn: <WH7161>
Lift not up <WH7311> <WH408> your horn <WH7161> on high: <WH4791> speak <WH1696> not with a stiff <WH6277> neck. <WH6677>
For <WH3588> promotion <WH7311> cometh neither <WH3808> from the east, <WH4480> <WH4161> nor from the west, <WH4480> <WH4628> nor <WH3808> from the south. <WH4480> <WH4057>
But <WH3588> God <WH430> is the judge: <WH8199> he putteth down <WH8213> one, <WH2088> and setteth <WH7311> up another. <WH2088>

For <WH3588> in the hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068> there is a cup, <WH3563> and the wine <WH3196> is red; <WH2560> it is full <WH4392> of mixture; <WH4538> and he poureth out <WH5064> of the same: <WH4480> <WH2088> but <WH389> the dregs <WH8105> thereof, all <WH3605> the wicked <WH7563> of the earth <WH776> shall wring them out, <WH4680> and drink <WH8354> them.
But I <WH589> will declare <WH5046> forever; <WH5769> I will sing praises <WH2167> to the God <WH430> of Jacob. <WH3290>
All <WH3605> the horns <WH7161> of the wicked <WH7563> also will I cut off; <WH1438> but the horns <WH7161> of the righteous <WH6662> shall be exalted. <WH7311>
